properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA TO MARTINIQUE.
DNC 14.
12 METER S/V MAURABLIA, RED HULL WITH WHITE STRIPE,
ONE PERSONS ON BOARD, SINKING BETWEEN
SAINT LUCIA (13-53N 060-58W) AND
MARTINIQUE (14-40N 061-00W).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
